SEARCH
Package com.streamline.frontend.terminal

Class TerminalWindowManager

java.lang.Object
com.streamline.frontend.terminal.TerminalWindowManager
public class TerminalWindowManager extends Object
Manages all windows and transitions between them. Responsible for creating, showing, and closing windows.
Author:
wellatleastitried
